entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 10:55 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
